intro: Desmonema hirta, commonly known as the hairy desmonema, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Desmonema hirta is often used in coastal restoration projects due to its ability to stabilize sand dunes.
